Array: So... this used to be the release mechanism, I suppose?
Yes. The speedball travel network should be online now.
From here we can fast travel to any of the other stations, including the one in <color=location>Sky Base</color>.
We're making progress, but we just lost Resh'an.
What? I can see him right there!
It's just an empty puppet. The real him is gone.
Kind of creepy, kind of cool.
Nice to meet you, I'm Teaks.
Hey so, I was exploring near Repine and this speedball thing just opened up.
B'st brought power back. We can use it to get to Sky Base.
Oh? I'll tag along then, I GOTTA see that!
We must go to Sky Base. The speedball should have power now.
